genie.name: Genie
genie.description: This spell conjoures up a Genie who will do one of the following:  Open any door on the Board OR attack anyone on the board once with five combat dice.

swift_wind.name: Swift Wind
swift_wind.description: This spell may be cast on any one player, that player may roll twice as many dice as normal the next time they move.

tempest.name: Tempest
tempest.description: A small tempest is created which envelops one monster or player of your choice, that monster or player must miss their next turn.

heal_body.name: Heal Body
heal_body.description: This spell may be cast on any one player.  It will restore up to four lost body points that have been lost.

pass_through_rock.name: Pass Through Rock
pass_through_rock.description: This spell may be cast on any one player. That player may then move through walls when they next move, the player may walk through as many walls as their movement will allow.

rock_skin.name: Rock Skin
rock_skin.description: This spell may be cast on any one player. That player may roll two extra defence dice until the spell is broken.  The spell is broken when that player is wounded.

ball_of_flame.name: Ball of Flame
ball_of_flame.description: This spell may be cast on any monster or player. It will inflict 2 points of body damage, the victim may roll two dice, for each shield they roll the damage is reduced by 1 to a minimum of zero

courage.name: Courage
courage.description: This spell may be cast on any one player.  That player may roll two additional dice until the spell is broken, the spell is broken when there are no monsters visible to that player.

fire_of_wrath.name: Fire of Wrath
fire_of_wrath.description: This spell may be cast at any one monster or player, anywhere on the board.  It will seek out your enemy and will inflict one body point unless your opponent can roll a shield on one combat dice.

sleep.name: Sleep
sleep.description: This spell will put one monster or player to sleep.  They may try to defend themselves by rolling one die per mind point.  If they roll a shield they are unaffected, once asleep they may not attack or defend.  They will awake if they roll a 6 at the start of their turn or if attacked.

veil_of_mist.name: Veil of Mist
veil_of_mist.description: This spell may be cast on one player, that player may move through spaces that are occupied the next time they move.

water_of_healing.name: Water of Healing
water_of_healing.description: This spell may be cast on any one player.  It will restore up to four lost body points that have been lost.

healing.name: Potion of Healing
healing.description: Enveloped in a bundle of rags you find a small bottle of liquid.  You recognize it as a healing potion.  You may drink the potion at any time, it will restore up to four body points.  The card is then discarded.

holy_water.name: Holy Water
holy_water.description: Discarded and forgotten in a corner of the room you find a vial of Holy Water.  You may use the Holy Water instead of attacking, it will kill any undead creature.  Discard after use.

heroic.name: Heroic Brew
heroic.description: A leather bag hanging on the wall contains a potion.  It is a Heroic Brew.  The potion may be taken just before an attack.  Any player who drinks the potion will be able to make two attacks instead of one for one turn only.  The item is then discarded.

resilience.name: Potion of Resilience
resilience.description: Amidst a collection of old bottles and earthen jugs you find a small clear vial, a Potion of Resilience!  It may be taken at any time, you may then roll two extra combat dice in defence when you next defend.  The card is then discarded.

speed.name: Potion of Speed
speed.description: Standing on a shelf you see a dusty bottle, as you wipe it clean you realise it is a potion of speed!  You may drink the potion at any time, it will allow you to roll twice as many dice as usual the next time you move.  The card is then discarded.

strength.name: Potion of Strength
strength.description: You find a small purple bottle, it is a potion of strength!  You may drink the potion at any time, it will enable you to roll two extra combat dice in attack in your next attack.  The card is then discarded.
